SAINT.Name: On this day, we sing the service for the Finding of the Head of the Forerunner
Venerable Procopius, Confessor of Decapolis (+ c. 750)
New Hieromartyr Priest Peter, Martyr Michael (+1938)
Venerable Titus the Presbyter of the Caves of Kiev (+ after 1196)
Venerable Thalelaeus the Hermit of Syria (+460)
Holy Hierarch Macarius, Bishop of Jerusalem
Venerable Titus the Soldier, of the Kiev Caves (14th C)
